text:
Hi Winston, 
Honestly, I don’t think I have, but we have a script for it. I can try that,
but they’ll still only see 23H2 now, because… 
Per my previous post/thread, per my testing Windows 11 Home does not only not
use the target version, if I set a target (to 22H2) WU does not offer 22H2 at
all. So we have to remove the target on 11 Home. 11 Pro does honor it
correctly, as does 10 Home (though Home is missing from the MS doc page for that
setting). 
---- 
Steve Yates
ITS, Inc.
%40SN6PR08MB5517.namprd08.prod.outlook.com

metadata.email_text_original:
RE: WSUS: New Update(s) Alert From WSUS 
Hi Winston, 
Honestly, I don’t think I have, but we have a script for it.  I can try that,
but they’ll still only see 23H2 now, because… 
Per my previous post/thread, per my testing Windows 11 Home does not only not
use the target version, if I set a target (to 22H2) WU does not offer 22H2 at
all.  So we have to remove the target on 11 Home.  11 Pro does honor it
correctly, as does 10 Home (though Home is missing from the MS doc page for that
setting). 
---- 
Steve Yates
ITS, Inc.
